channel.title: DiversityX The Features Are Up To You (LOST LEGACY REMAKE)
channel.description:
[center][u][size=36pt][b][u]DiversityX[/u][/b][/size][/u][/center] [center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bjoFRmB.gif[/img][/center] [center]This is going to be a lost legacy remake. [/center]
[center][font=arial black][size=18pt][b]Features [/b] [/size] [/font] [/center]
[center][size=12pt][b][u]*Amazing Combat *Full Chaotic + PvP Armor Degrading *Fullscreen *All Nex Armours With Effect *Curses 100% *Quick Prayers *Skillng Zone *New Runescape Hitsplats *All Dupes Fixed *Many Pk Locations *All Skills Functioning *Dragon Claws 100% *Fast Fluid Client *Perfect Eco *Amazing Stability *Perfect Switching *New Runescape Cursors *Amazing Graphics *Xp Counter *Fun Minigames *Unique Content *Full Member System *Unique Clan Chat System *Many Trainning Locations *A Lot Of Bosses *Fun Killstreak System *Symbol Support *Dicing *Frost Dragons - System *Revenant Cave *Autocasting *Random Events[/u][/b][/size][/center]
[center][b][u]www.diversityx.tk Is the forums http://www.diversityx.tk/showthread.php?tid=85[/u][/b][/center]
[center][size=14pt][b]Many more features will be added as we go but for now. I hope you enjoy lost legacys remake. There is going to be a lot of changes around here pretty soon. I know a lot of people loved this source too :L [/b] [/size] [/center]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/w1y06p.png[/img] [center]Please note the background has been changed to a oringal runescape background[/center]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2hh3sbt.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/v7eip4.png[/img] [center][b]Good old bounty hunter [/b] [/center]
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/33ldyd2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/jrv2f5.png[/img]

item.title: DiversityX The Features Are Up To You (LOST LEGACY REMAKE)
item.dc:creator: @dawsonsmokes dawsonsmokes
item.description:
@dawsonsmokes wrote:

[center][size=36pt]DiversityX[/size][/center]
[center][/center]
[center]This is going to be a lost legacy remake. [/center]

[center][font=arial black][size=18pt]Features [/size] [/font] [/center]

[center][size=12pt]*Amazing Combat
*Full Chaotic + PvP Armor Degrading
*Fullscreen
*All Nex Armours With Effect
*Curses 100%
*Quick Prayers
*Skillng Zone
*New Runescape Hitsplats
*All Dupes Fixed
*Many Pk Locations
*All Skills Functioning
*Dragon Claws 100%
*Fast Fluid Client
*Perfect Eco
*Amazing Stability
*Perfect Switching
*New Runescape Cursors
*Amazing Graphics
*Xp Counter
*Fun Minigames
*Unique Content
*Full Member System
*Unique Clan Chat System
*Many Trainning Locations
*A Lot Of Bosses
*Fun Killstreak System
*Symbol Support
*Dicing
*Frost Dragons - System
*Revenant Cave
*Autocasting
*Random Events[/size][/center]

[center]www.diversityx.tk Is the forums
http://www.diversityx.tk/showthread.php?tid=85[/center]

[center][size=14pt]Many more features will be added as we go but for now. I hope you enjoy lost legacys remake. There is going to be a lot of changes around here pretty soon. I know a lot of people loved this source too :L [/size] [/center]

[center]Please note the background has been changed to a oringal runescape background[/center]
